description:
Two bedrooms with queen beds available in a three-bedroom apt. 

We are close to Greenwich Village and all of the best parts (lower) Manhattan.. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers.

Two bedrooms available in a three bedroom apt. 
I live in the third bedroom. 
Both available bedrooms have queen beds.

Guests have full access to the apartment - living room, kitchen, bathroom.
I cook a lot. If we are all home, I will happily cook for you too!

I can help you with any info you need about getting around NYC or cool places to go and things to do.

The West Village is the most beautiful part of New York. Many celebrities live around here. The Friends building is almost across the street. Sara Jesica Parker lives a few blocks away. It is the classic, old NY neighborhood feel.

Walking distance to the following major subway lines:
Christopher Street Path Station  - 1 min walking
Christopher Street 1 & 9 NYC Subway - 2 min walking 
West 4th Street NYC Subway (A,C,E,B,D,F) - 8 min walking 

Travel time to major NYC destinations: 
Times Square - 18 min by 1 Train
Central Park - 24 min by train
name: 2 brs - queen beds - in large, sunny West Vill apt
